headline: Acrisure Completes Acquisition of Global Payments’ Payroll Business
summary: GRAND RAPIDS, Mich., October 01, 2025--Acrisure, a global fintech leader, today announced the closing of its acquisition of Heartland Payroll Solutions ("Heartland Payroll"), one of the leading payroll and Human Capital Management (HCM) companies in the United Sates, from Global Payments, Inc. (NYSE: GPN) for $1.1 billion. The acquisition will bring Heartland Payroll’s 50,000+ clients under the Acrisure umbrella and significantly expand the company’s current payroll and HCM capabilities.

(NYSE: GPN) for $1.1 billion. The acquisition will bring Heartland Payroll’s 50,000+ clients under the Acrisure umbrella and significantly expand the company’s current payroll and HCM capabilities.

headline: Global Payments Completes Divestiture of Payroll Business
summary: ATLANTA, October 01, 2025--Global Payments Inc. (NYSE: GPN) announced today that it recently completed the divestiture of its Payroll business to Acrisure for $1.1 billion.

raw.headline: Global Payments Completes Divestiture of Payroll Business
raw.summary: ATLANTA, October 01, 2025--Global Payments Inc. (NYSE: GPN) announced today that it recently completed the divestiture of its Payroll business to Acrisure for $1.1 billion.
